name: Bug Hollow
description:
THE REIGN OF MAN HAS ENDED
INSECTS RULE THE WORLD

A Lone Explorer ventures into the polluted ruin...

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to advance dialog when talking to NPCs
  • Z to power the Orb (if the player has the item)

Gameplay:

Bump into enemies to attack them. Attacks from the back are the most effective, then the sides, then the front. Attacks to the front which are offset are more effective than attacks which are head on. Bump into NPCs to talk to them.

Staying still refills health.

Credits

  • Design and Code by _never_k
  • Art and Story by helpcomputer0
  • Music by Bruno Almeida

Some sound effects from the "Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" by SubspaceAudio (Juhani Junkala)

https://juhanijunkala.com/

https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
